subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics ended their franchise-record losing streak at 18 games last night, getting 32 points from Paul Pierce and 21 from Gerald Green to defeat the Milwaukee Bucks, 117-97.
snippet: The Boston Celtics ended their franchise-record losing streak at 18 games last night, getting 32 points from Paul Pierce and 21 from Gerald Green to defeat the Milwaukee Bucks, 117-97.
